mapper.select: select count(*) from t_item te left join t_commoditytype ty on ty.typeId=te.TypeId left join brand br on br.itemId = te.itemId where te.status = 1

select te.id,te.commodityName,te.artNo,te.commodityPrice,te.status,te.newProduct,te.inventory,ty.typeName,br.name,te.pictureUrl from t_item te left join t_commoditytype ty on ty.typeId=te.TypeId left join brand br on br.itemId = te.itemId where te.status = 1
LIMIT #{start},#{end}
mapper.update: update t_item t set t.commodityName = #{commodityName},t.inventory = #{inventory},t.artNo = #{artNo},t.TypeId = #{typeId},t.commodityPrice=#{commodityPrice},t.pictureUrl = #{pictureUrl},newProduct = #{newProduct},itemId = #{itemId} WHERE t.id = #{id}
mapper.select: select ty.*,it.inventory as inventory from t_commoditytype ty left join t_item it on it.TypeId=ty.itemId GROUP BY ty.typeName
select br.type from brand br left join t_commoditytype ty on ty.itemId = br.type WHERE ty.itemId = #{value} GROUP BY ty.itemId

select t.color ,t.weight,t.crowd,it.commodityName,ty.typeName,br.name,br.introduction as introduction from t_toyproperties t,t_item it,t_commoditytype ty,brand br WHERE t.itemId = it.itemId and t.typeId = ty.typeId and t.dranId = br.itemId and it.id = #{value}

select te.id,te.commodityName,te.commodityPrice,te.newProduct,te.inventory,ty.typeName,br.name,te.pictureUrl from t_item te left join t_commoditytype ty on ty.typeId=te.TypeId left join brand br on br.itemId = te.itemId WHERE te.status = 1

select te.id,te.commodityName,te.commodityPrice,te.newProduct,te.inventory,ty.typeName,br.name,br.introduction,te.sellquantity,te.pictureUrl,te.artNo,te.createDate,ty.typeId from t_item te left join t_commoditytype ty on ty.typeId=te.TypeId left join brand br on br.itemId = te.itemId WHERE te.id = #{value}
select * from t_accessories ac,t_commoditytype ty WHERE ty.typeId=ac.typeId and ac.typeId = #{value}
